headline: Harnessing the Power of Laboratory Data to Optimize Trial Design, Site Identification and Patient Recruitment, Upcoming Webinar Hosted by Xtalks
summary: In an increasingly complex and saturated clinical trials environment, it is essential to design and implement a trial that is targeted, inclusive and feasible. Protocols with overly stringent or broad eligibility criteria can lead to downstream challenges related to selecting sites and recruiting patients. Leveraging robust laboratory data can inform how to set up a trial for success from the start. Labcorp, a global leader in laboratory services, has deep expertise and access to diagnostic and
